Package dxf2svg.animation

Class Summary
AnimationEngine This class controls the animation process.
ElementEvent Deprecated. Removed in favour of the more flexible and general Attribute
SvgAnimator This class creates animation objects depending on the type of animation required.
SvgAnimator.SvgAnimate This class represents and encapsulates the <animate> element.
SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateColour This class specifies a colour transfromation over time.
SvgAnimator.SvgAnimateTransform The animate transform element animates a transformation attribute on a target element, thereby allowing animations to control translation, scaling, rotation and/or skewing.
SvgAnimator.SvgSet This class is an encapsulation of the animation element <set>, not to be confused with SvgCollection or java.util.Set.
 

Exception Summary
